item.title: "I've been stagnating in my current position as a mid-level Ruby on Rails developer"
item.description: Have you been applying to jobs hoping to get your career to the next level, but getting rejected every time? Are you afraid you’ll be stuck forever as an intermediate developer? 3 to 5 years of experience as a Ruby on Rails developer gotta be enough to eventually land a better job, right? It seems the only thing you can do is to just keep applying for more jobs. And hope for the best.
